response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us, but its worth to you is even greater. After careful consideration, we propose a price of $950,000 for this product. We believe this price reflects the high quality and exceptional value it offers to you. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further terms. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
